amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds for an application for an animal drug for creating transgenic salmon or any other transgenic fish.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for an application for an animal drug for creating transgenic salmon or any other transgenic fish.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 279 (Roll no. 218).
